name: HALO
body: The Halo series should still take a leaf from the Spartans' book, however. It needs to be faster, with fewer UNSC scenes to slow things to a crawl. It needs to be stronger and go all-in on Kwan and John-117's fledgling relationship. It needs to be smarter. Better use of camera shots, sets, and CGI will mask low production values.

name: STRANGER OF PARADISE
body: Like most people, I reasonably assumed when I saw this trailer that Stranger of Paradise, an action-focused alternate universe retelling of the original Final Fantasy, was going to be very bad indeed. But after a demo offered hope that the combat might actually be quite inventive.
